title: Forces - Number of Objects in System

content.description: The free-body diagram shown represents the directions, but not the relative magnitudes, of all the unique forces exerted on a box.
content.question: What is the minimum number of interacting objects that must participate in these interactions to make the free-body diagram shown possible?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
